content.en: Soil prediction algorithms: Scientists have been using algorithms to predict soil properties using near-infrared spectroscopy. They have compared different algorithms, such as Monte Carlo uninformative variable elimination and successive projections algorithm, to accurately estimate soil nitrogen and organic carbon. By using machine learning methods like partial least squares regression and support vector machine regression, they have been able to improve the accuracy of predicting soil parameters like organic matter content and pH.
content.da: Jordforudsigelsesalgoritmer: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at forudsige jordens egenskaber ved hjælp af nærinfrarød spektroskopi. De har sammenlignet forskellige algoritmer, såsom Monte Carlo uinformeret variabeleliminering og successive projektioner algoritme, for præcist at estimere jordens nitrogen og organisk kulstof. Ved at bruge maskinlæringsmetoder som partial least squares regression og support vector machine regression har de kunnet forbedre nøjagtigheden af at forudsige jordparametre som organisk indhold og pH.
